About.title: The Man Behind
About.question: Voctor, what is your objective as an independent winemaker?
About.answer: To reveal the voice and preserve the character of grapes sourced from partner vineyards.

WineCards.title: Craftsmanship at the Heart of the Bottle.
WineCards.description1: Vins Voctor are wines of identity that will always tell you a story. With these wines, we have a demonstration of form and content. One cannot exist without the other, and both must be of high quality.
WineCards.description2: The liquid tells you the terroir, and the label tells you the story of the winemaker. Together, the two form an identity.

Vigne.title: The Region
Vigne.subtitle: The identity of Vins Voctor is cultivated across three exceptional terroirs.

points.chateaubourg: In Châteaubourg, Syrah finds its full expression to give birth to the Saint-Joseph appellation.
points.roussas: Further south, the area of Roussas offers an ideal setting for Grenache Noir.
points.allan: Allan welcomes our white varietals, Grenache Blanc and Bourboulenc, for wines of great finesse.

AboutPage.title: Meet
AboutPage.mention: In the words of writer Iréne Languin in the Glou Guide 8:

story.content: At 38, Josimar Yacuta Verduzco has already lived several lives. Born in Mexico and raised in California, he first taught Spanish at university before embarking on a military career in the French Foreign Legion. Five years in the infantry followed, during which he developed a deep attachment to the French countryside.

In 2019, he traded the green beret for red and white juice. He trained alongside an outstanding mentor in one of the Northern Rhône’s most respected appellations — Matthieu Barret in Cornas — before completing a BTS degree in viticulture and oenology with a focus on organic farming in the Jura. At the same time, personal savings and harvest work on a friend’s vineyards allowed him to begin building his own négociant activity.

For the past three years, the man also known as Voctor has been working out of a small garage converted into a cellar, crafting a focused range of artisanal wines that stand firm on their legs, are full of character, and dressed with a fine energy.

WinesPage.title: The Cuvées at <brand>Vins Voctor</brand>
WinesPage.description1: In the cellar, Josimar’s priority is to produce clean, precise and reliable wines, with a clear sense of responsibility toward those who open and share them. A wine must be alive and expressive, but also readable, stable and consistent from bottle to bottle. Energy, drinkability, finesse, complexity and length on the palate guide the development of each cuvée.
WinesPage.description2: Vinifications are carried out in a simple and precise manner, without fining or filtration, without oenological additives, and with very limited additions of SO₂ — generally around 30 mg/L total, depending on the vintage. Strict attention is paid to the hygiene of all equipment and vessels, an essential condition for the stability and reliability of the wines. A significant proportion of the wines are aged in 54-liter glass demijohns or in stainless steel tanks, in order to preserve fruit purity, natural balance and the faithful expression of the wine.

ma-carriere.name: Ma carrière
ma-carriere.description: A Saint-Joseph of character, pure expression of Syrah on its original terroir.

anne-marie.name: Anne-Marie
anne-marie.description: A solar and generous wine, faithful reflection of the Grenache Noir from Drôme.

doucement-cowboy.name: Doucement cowboy
doucement-cowboy.description: A Syrah from Ardèche full of finesse, prioritizing fruit and fluidity.

one-night.name: One night
one-night.description: The ideal companion for improvised moments, a light and crisp thirst-quenching wine.

blanca.name: Blanca
blanca.description: A white wine all in lace, carried by floral notes and great freshness.

simulacre.name: Simulacre
simulacre.description: A surprising maceration (orange) wine, with notes of exotic fruits and apricot.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.intro: We place the utmost importance on protecting your personal data. This policy details how we collect, use, and protect your information.

1.title: Article 1: Data Collection
1.intro: We only collect information necessary for the proper functioning of the site and our communications:

list.contact: Information sent via the contact form (Name, email, message).
list.cookies: Navigation data via technical cookies (essential for operation).

2.title: Article 2: Data Usage
2.intro: Your data is used exclusively to:

list.respond: Respond to your contact or information requests.
list.improve: Improve user experience and site performance.

3.title: Article 3: Security and Storage
3.content: Data security is our priority. We use standard encryption protocols to protect data transmissions. Your information is stored on secure servers and is never sold to third parties.

4.title: Article 4: Your Rights
4.intro: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights:

list.access: Right of access: Obtain a copy of your data.
list.erasure: Right to erasure: Request deletion of your data.
list.opposition: Right to object: Refuse usage of your data.

5.title: Article 5: Contact
5.content: To exercise your rights or for any questions regarding this policy, you can contact us directly via our contact form or at the email address indicated in our legal notices.

editor.title: 1. Website Editor
editor.text: The website Vins Voctor is edited by Josimar Yacuta Verduzco, artisan winemaker.
editor.address: Address: 149 Av. du Colonel Rousset, 07130 Cornas, France

hosting.title: 2. Hosting

alcohol.title: 4. Alcohol Sales & Minors
alcohol.text: In accordance with Article L. 3342-1 of the Public Health Code, the sale of alcohol to minors under 18 is prohibited. Alcohol abuse is dangerous for health, please consume in moderation.

privacy.title: 5. Personal Data
privacy.text: The processing of your data is detailed in our <link>Privacy Policy</link>.

liability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
liability.text: Vins Voctor cannot be held responsible for omissions or inaccuracies in the update of information. Product photos are not contractual.

ContactPage.message: I would be glad to welcome you to a tasting at my place in Cornas. Please call to make an appointment.
